+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8286057
+ * @summary Make javac error on a generic enum friendlier
+ * @compile/fail/ref=T8286057.out -XDrawDiagnostics T8286057.java
+ */
+
+public class T8286057 {
+    public enum E<T> {}
+}
+

+1 error
\ No newline at end of file
